modName: Black nordplate armour for male and black Shield of Ysgramor
summary: Simply re-texture for the nordplate armour for male player and Shield of Ysgramor.
descriptionHtml:
I wanted to create a black paladin...

To install:
Copy the files in Data / textures / armour / \"name of armor\"
author: Vatanabe
